vstore.android_filebox.files_fragment

Class FilesRecyclerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
      • vstore.android_filebox.files_fragment.FilesRecyclerAdapter

  • public class FilesRecyclerAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
    This class is the basic adapter for the file recycler view, extending RecyclerView.Adapter. A custom viewholder is specified to gives access to the views.
